name: Pong (itch) (Hunternox)
description:
This game is a simple pong game containing a single player mode and a two players mode... When the score is 10, you win !
The game was made in Python and he contains exe for Windows users without the next stuff installed : Pygame and Python.

  • Controls
    player 1 :  Up and Down arrows
    player 2 : s and x keys
    fullscreen : f key
    quit : escape key
